subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Ethical issues in fight over baby
An ethical debate is pitting the mother of a dying child against a children's hospital, and medical ethicists against each other.

10. Taliban: Bin Laden plans Iraq strikes




 
















Man admits sex with 9-year-old
A South Carolina man pleads guilty to impregnating a girl when she was 9-years-old. WYFF's Michael Cogdill reports (April 25)
